title: Schedule - 2026 Winter Olympics - Team Canada
text: Schedule – 2026 Winter Olympics Check out the official competition schedule for the Milano Cortina 2026 Olympic Winter Games. Competition will be held from February 4 to February 22, 2026 with the Opening Ceremony on February 6, 2026. This official schedule shows events in the time zone set on the viewer’s device. It will be updated to reflect any changes that might occur during the Games. Please note that athlete names will only be visible after start lists for the respective events and competition phases within those events are published. More Milano Cortina 2026 Schedule Info Milano Cortina 2026 Brave Is Unbeatable Behind every perfect run or flawless routine on the global stage are hidden stories of resilience. The defining moments in the careers of many Team Canada athletes come before they set foot on a podium as they face struggles that most fans never see.
